mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_user (username, password, type, state, email, realName,sex, birthday, departmentId, qq, address, creator, createtime, mobile, avatar, modifier,modifyTime,deleteStatus) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{type}, #{state}, #{email}, #{realName}, #{sex},#{birthday},#{departmentId}, #{qq},#{address}, #{creator}, #{createTime},#{mobile},#{avatar},#{modifier}, #{modifyTime},#{deleteStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT cu.id, cu.username, cu.PASSWORD, cu.type, cu.state, cu.email, cu.realName, cu.qq, cu.mobile, cu.address, cu.departmentId, cu.sex, cu.birthday, cu.avatar, cu.creator, cu.createtime, cu.modifier, cu.modifyTime, cu.deleteStatus, cd.id as dept_id, cd.NAME AS dept_name, cr.id as role_id, cr.NAME AS roleName FROM cms_user cu LEFT JOIN cms_department cd ON cu.departmentId = cd.id LEFT JOIN cms_user_role cur ON cur.userId = cu.id LEFT JOIN cms_role cr ON cr.id = cur.roleId where username = #{username}
